H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7122.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H319.def: = pertaining to being located far behind other objects in a row, in a direction away from the spectator; ≈ since the way the ancient Israelites oriented themselves was with their backs facing the East, this term presupposes a westerly direction

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H7205.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ first son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1060.def: = first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing

H3581.def: = state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

H7225.def: = point in time at which an event starts happening

H202.def: = state of being physically strong and healthy which usually includes the ability of producing children

H3499.def: = what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects

H7613.def: = process when part of the human body is raised from a lower position

H5794.def: = state in which a person, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H6349.def: = state in which humans are irresponsible and untrustworthy

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H3498.def: = state in which humans, animals, or objects remain in a certain place after part of the original quantity has been located elsewhere

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H4904.def: = state in which humans are lying down to rest

H227.def: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

H2490.def: = action by which priests disqualify themselves for religious service ◄ by unlawful behavior

26.gl: to have sex with (someone else's) wife

H8095.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ second son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3878.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H4380.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H2555.def: = pattern of behavior by which humans behave aggressively towards other humans, ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H5475.def: = a group or gathering of persons (like friends or members of the same group) or heavenly beings

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H3161.def: = action by which humans form a group with other humans, often in order to engage in a certain activity together

H2026.def: = causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H7522.def: = state in which deities or humans in a position of authority are favorable disposed towards a person or activity

H779.def: = to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H5794.def: = state in which a person, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force

H7185.def: = process by which humans experience an event as difficult to handle or hard to accept

H2505.def: = causative action by which humans or deities divide an object (or range of objects) into portions; ► usually with the intention to use one or more of these portions for a particular purpose

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H3034.def: literally: to confess (God's) name; hence: = action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H7812.def: = to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H2964.def: literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare

H3766.def: = process by which humans or animals sink on their knees ◄ as a result of being unable to keep standing up

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

31.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H2710.def: = action by which humans reproduce the form or shape of an object on another object; ◄ by carving, drawing, writing, etc.; ► for the purpose of decoration, communication, sometimes as preparation for a new construction

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H7886.def: = man, possibly to be identified with {L:Shelah<SDBH:שֵׁלָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}׃ ► regarded as father of inhabitants of {L:Shiloh<SDBH:שִׁילֹה>}

H3349.def: = a state in which humans are willing to obey someone in a position of authority

42.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H631.def: = causative action by which humans tie (part of) the body of (other) humans or animals with a rope, cord, or chain ► in order to keep them under control

H5895.def: = young male {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>}; ≈ possibly associated with liveliness and unruliness

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H860.def: = large, strong, female {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} ► used for riding

H3526.def: = action by which humans remove physical contamination from their bodies by dipping it in water, ≈ used figuratively to denote the removal of guilt

H3830.def: = generic designation for any article of clothing

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H2447.def: = pertaining to having one's eyeball tinged with blood; ◄ usually the result of drinking much wine; ≈ not necessarily seen as something bad

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H3836.def: = state in which objects are white in color

H2461.def: = white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well-being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex

H2074.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and sixth son of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H591.def: = boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean

H3411.def: = the part of an object or area that is the furthest away from the perspective of the speaker or narrator

H6721.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; presumably a personification of the city that played a prominent role in Canaanite culture and history

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3485.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ ninth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and fifth son of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1634.def: = any of the pieces of hard, whitish tissue that together constitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H4942.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = area enclosed by a stone wall or hedge made of branches and thorns, with a narrow opening which can be closed with brush or by the shepherd’s body; ► used for keeping sheep at night to protect them from thieves or wild animals

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H4496.def: literally: rest; hence: = a state of mind in which humans find relief after a time of distress

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H5276.def: = state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation

H5186.def: = state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

H7926.def: = the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

H4522.def: = a class of people who are enlisted compulsorily to do work for others

H5647.def: = state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations

H1835.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H1835.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5175.def: = long legless reptile without eyelids or external ears; it moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; ≈ symbol of lurking, unexpected danger; associated with lies, deception, and misleading teaching

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H8207.def: exact meaning unknown: = type of viper; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with lurking danger

H734.def: = relatively narrow {L:road<SDBH:דֶּרֶךְ>} that connects two locations and facilitates travelling

H5391.def: = action by which a person or animal uses teeth to cut into something, like another person or animal

H5483.def: = large domesticated solid-hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

H6119.def: = the back part of the foot of humans and animals below the ankle

H7392.def: = action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} or a {L:horse<SDBH:סוּס>} or in a {L:chariot<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H268.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

21.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H6960.def: = state in which humans are confident that their longing will be fulfilled

H3444.def: = causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1410.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, slave of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1464.def: = to set upon with force and weapons

H1416.def: = a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army

H6119.def: = the back part of the foot of humans and animals below the ankle

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H836.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, slave of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H8082.def: literally: fatling; hence: = a young animal that has been fattened to prepare it for slaughter, either for food or sacrifice

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H4574.def: = things, such as food or certain events, that bring about extreme joy to humans

12.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H5321.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H561.def: = words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H6509.def: = process by which humans, animals, or plants produce much offspring, ► and so grow in number and strength

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6805.def: = action by which humans put one foot before the other in order to move forward

H1167.def: = person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

H2671.def: = pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment

H4843.def: = state in which a liquid has a sharp, pungent taste; ≈ regarded as unpleasant and unsuitable for consumption; associated with anger and grief

H7232.def: = process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency

H7852.def: = state in which humans harbor resentment against (other) humans for things they did in the past

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H386.def: = state of not being subject to change

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H2220.def: = each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈  directly associated with strength and power

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6339.def: = causative action by which a goldsmith improves the quality of a precious metal by smelting it in the fire and so removing all contaminants

H46.def: probably a variant spelling of {L:אַבִּיר<SDBH:אַבִּיר>}; = name of God, stressing his great power and his exclusivity as the God of Jacob and his descendants

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H5826.def: = process by which humans receive assistance or supported from other humans or deities

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7706.def: = deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All-sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H1293.def: = action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H8415.def: = great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H7356.def: = state in which humans feel compassion for others, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well-being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action

H1293.def: = action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1396.def: = process by which humans gain strength, power, and authority, which enables them to do things that others are unable to accomplish

H2029.def: = process by which someone becomes pregnant

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H8378.def: = process by which someone senses a physical craving for food

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H1389.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H6936.def: = upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with "{L:feet<SDBH:רֶגֶל>}" to refer to the whole physical body

H5139.def: = a person who has been singled out for a position of leadership

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2061.def: = wild, four-footed, predatory canine; light-brown fur, similar to jackal, but much bigger; ◄ Canis lupus; ► commonly prey on flocks; ≈ regarded as ravenous and fierce; symbol of roaming, opportunistic, dangerous, fierce, and clever banditry

H2963.def: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H5706.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H2505.def: = causative action by which humans or deities divide an object (or range of objects) into portions; ► usually with the intention to use one or more of these portions for a particular purpose

11.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1293.def: = action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H4631.def: = a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H2850.def: = member of ethnic group inhabiting {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>} before arrival of {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ◄ regarded as descendants of {L:Heth<SDBH:חֵת>}

H4631.def: = a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H4375.def: = location containing a cave, ◄ near {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>}, ► bought from {L:Ephron<SDBH:עֶפְרֹון>} the Hittite and used as burial place for {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}, {L:Sarah<SDBH:שָׂרָה>}, {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}, {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}, and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}

H4471.def: = man; ◄ {L:Amorite<SDBH:אֱמֹרִי>}; brother of {L:Eshkol<SDBH:אֶשְׁכֹּול>} and {L:Aner<SDBH:עָנֵר>}; ► ally of {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3667.def: = man; ◄ youngest son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Canaanites<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>}

H85.def: = man, also known as {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7069.def: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2850.def: = member of ethnic group inhabiting {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>} before arrival of {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ◄ regarded as descendants of {L:Heth<SDBH:חֵת>}

H6913.def: = place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness

H272.def: = state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H85.def: = man, also known as {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H3327.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>} and {L:Sarah<SDBH:שָׂרָה>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>} and {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}

H7259.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Bethuel<SDBH:בְּתוּאֵל>}; sister of {L:Laban<SDBH:לָבָן>}; ► wife of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; mother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>} and {L:Jakob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}

H3812.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Laban<SDBH:לָבָן>}; ► first wife of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; mother of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}, {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}, {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}, {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, {L:Issachar<SDBH:יִשָּׂשכָר>}, {L:Zebulun<SDBH:זְבוּלוּן>}, {L:Dinah<SDBH:דִּינָה>}, and, through her slave {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, of {L:Gad<SDBH:גָּד>} and {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H4631.def: = a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4735.def: = an animate or inanimate object ◄ acquired by humans by means of a financial transaction or in another way

H2845.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; ► regarded as founder of {L:Hittites<SDBH:חִתִּי>}

H3290.def: = man, also known as {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}; ◄ second son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

H3615.def: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4296.def: = a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70-80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sit or sleep on

H1478.def: = process by which a human being breathes his last breath, ◄ either as a result of a natural cause or of an unnatural cause, ► resulting in death
